# Authorizations Flow {.unnumbered}

## User Perspective {-}

```{mermaid}
flowchart
  A[Register] --> B[Confirm account in email] --> C[Request Authorization From]
  C --> D[Existing Institution] --> H(Receive Databrary Email 'Next steps')
  C --> E[New Institution] --> H(Receive Databrary Email 'Next steps')
  C --> G[Authorized Investigator] --> I{Authorized Investigator reviews/grants Affiliate Access}
  A --> F[No Request] --> J(Receive Databrary Email 'How to request access')
  B --> F[No Request] --> J(Receive Databrary Email 'How to request access')
```

## Admin Perspective {-}

```{mermaid}
flowchart
  A[Request Type] --> B[Existing Institution] --> G{View Person Profile Page - Eligible? } --> H(Yes, Send Email 'Next steps')
  G --> I(No, Send Email 'To Process Request')
 A --> C[New Institution] --> I{View Institution Profile Page - Eligible?} --> 
 A --> D[Authorized Investigator]
 A --> E[No Request] --> F(Send Email 'To Initiate Authorization')
  
  
```
